row.process:
! Attach python file to prepare running :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "GET_APP_STATUS", T :SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_get_app_status.py")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" ' : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, 'arb -cmd execute ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&WSADMIN#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-user "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-password "&UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD#" ') : IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# <> "localhost" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-host "&UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-port "&UC4RB_WAS_PORT#" ' ) : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-f "&FILENAME#" ')
! Add list argument of python to command : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME#" ')
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" ')
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" ')
&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
